title: Intuitive Energy Healing Services — RITUAL BODYWORK
description: This is a custom Healing Service. Ideal for an add on to any massage service or for someone interested in trying out the realm of energy healing. Sessions are use to clear energy blockages and allow the body to rid itself of patterns that may hold us back.
cleaned_text: is a custom Healing Service. You can discuss what you are looking to accomplish and she can tailor your session around these needs. Sessions run between 45 minutes and an hour and include an extensive interview in order to assess and address your specific needs.
